column5: Fight it likes its a walleye has become a bit of a battle cry on our trips  - wrestling one in assuming its a snot rocket cost a fish Newest post is up explaining how it came to be Wondering what your battle cries are other than the usual fish on https://www.northernjacks.com/post/fight-it-like-its-a-walleye Cheers Andrew
I'm not much of a "Battle - Cry" type but great story, thanks for sharing.  I 25" eye is a great catch anywhere outside of Erie or LSC.
Thanks Krattor - glad you enjoyed it!
